summary: This release brings a fresh, glass-inspired aesthetic to Grove's interface with new components and seasonal touches. We've polished navigation and icons across the platform for a more consistent and delightful experience, while also adding subtle interactions and accessibility improvements. It's all about making Grove feel more vibrant and intuitive as you cultivate your blog.

features: add nature components library to engine package
add GlassLogo to asset viewer tool
add seasonal variations to GlassLogo component
add GlassLogo component with glassmorphism styling
add pricing tier icons to match Plant page
redesign with glass aesthetic and add GlassNavbar component
add Lucide icons to feature rows in pricing table
add expressive icons to all roadmap items and footer
redesign signup page with warm glassy sections
fixes: use $derived.by for complex derived value in GlassLogo
replace class: directive with conditional class string
resolve duplicate Moon import in roadmap
use Newspaper icon for Blog to avoid BookOpen duplication
use Sprout icon for Plant Your Blog button
